shared.supportPrompt: For any questions or assistance, we're here for you at:

welcome.subject: Welcome to NeshamaTech | Your Journey Begins Here
welcome.title: Your Journey Begins Here
welcome.intro: We are thrilled and excited that you've joined the NeshamaTech family. We are here to guide you, step by step, on the journey to finding a true and meaningful connection. This isn't just another app; it's a home.
welcome.matchmakerAssigned: We're happy to let you know that a personal matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, has been assigned to you. They will be in touch soon to get to know you on a deeper level.
welcome.getStarted: Your account is ready. The first step is to complete your personal profile so we can start finding precise matches that truly resonate with your soul.

accountSetup.subject: An Invitation to Activate Your NeshamaTech Account
accountSetup.title: Your Profile is Waiting
accountSetup.intro: Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, believes in your potential and has created a profile for you in our system. To take ownership, update your details, and start seeing suggestions, all you need to do is set a personal password.
accountSetup.actionPrompt: Click the button to set your password and activate your account:
accountSetup.notice: Please note: This link is personal, single-use, and valid for {{expiresIn}}.
accountSetup.nextStep: After setting your password, you can log in with your email address and begin your journey.

emailOtpVerification.subject: Your NeshamaTech Verification Code
emailOtpVerification.title: Almost There...
emailOtpVerification.intro: To complete the verification and ensure your account is secure, please use the following code:
emailOtpVerification.securityNote: This code is just for you. For your safety, never share it with anyone.

invitation.subject: {{matchmakerName}} is inviting you to join NeshamaTech
invitation.title: You've Received a Personal Invitation
invitation.intro: Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, thinks you would be a great fit for NeshamaTech, a community of high-quality individuals seeking serious relationships. We would be delighted for you to join us on this journey.
invitation.actionPrompt: To join and create your profile, please click the link below:
invitation.expiryNotice: Your personal invitation is valid for {{expiresIn}}.

suggestion.subject: We Have a Good Feeling About This Suggestion for You
suggestion.title: A New Suggestion is on its Way
suggestion.intro: Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, was thinking of you and has prepared a new suggestion that looks especially promising. We've put thought into it and believe there's real potential here.
suggestion.previewTitle: A small glimpse into the suggestion:
suggestion.actionPrompt: To view the full profile and make a decision, we invite you to visit your personal dashboard:
suggestion.closing: We look forward to hearing from you,

shareContactDetails.subject: Best of luck! Contact details have been shared
shareContactDetails.title: Embarking on a Shared Path
shareContactDetails.intro: How wonderful! Both sides have approved the suggestion, which is always an exciting moment for us. It's time to take the next step and get to know each other. The contact details have also been sent to the other party.
shareContactDetails.tipContent: A first phone call can be a bit nerve-wracking, and that's natural. Take a breath, remember the goal is simply to get acquainted, and most importantly - be yourself. We recommend making initial contact within the next 24-48 hours.
shareContactDetails.goodLuck: We wish you a pleasant conversation and a successful meeting!

availabilityCheck.subject: An availability check from your matchmaker
availabilityCheck.title: Checking if This is a Good Time
availabilityCheck.intro: Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, is considering a suggestion for you and wants to ensure you are available and open to a new connection before proceeding.
availabilityCheck.actionPrompt: We would appreciate it if you could update us on your availability through your personal dashboard:
availabilityCheck.noticeContent: Your response will help your matchmaker focus on the most relevant suggestions for you right now.

passwordResetOtp.subject: Password Reset Code for NeshamaTech
passwordResetOtp.title: Resetting Your Password
passwordResetOtp.intro: We received a request to reset your password. To proceed, please use the following one-time code:
passwordResetOtp.securityNote: Didn't request a password reset? You can safely ignore this message. Your account is secure.

passwordChangedConfirmation.subject: Your NeshamaTech Password Has Been Successfully Updated
passwordChangedConfirmation.title: Security Update: Your Password Was Changed
passwordChangedConfirmation.intro: This is a confirmation that the password for your NeshamaTech account has been successfully changed. Your account is now secured with the new password.
passwordChangedConfirmation.securityNote: If you did not make this change, please contact us immediately so we can investigate.

customMessage.subject: A personal message from your matchmaker
customMessage.reminderText: This is a friendly reminder that a match suggestion from {{matchmakerName}} is awaiting your response. To view the details and reply, please log in to the system.

PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.subject: We have a good feeling about this new suggestion for you
PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.body: Hello {{partyName}}, {{matchmakerName}} has sent you a new and promising suggestion. For more details and to make your decision, please log in to your personal dashboard: {{reviewUrl}}
PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.htmlBody:
Hello {{partyName}},

Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, was thinking of you and has prepared a new suggestion that looks especially promising.

To review the full profile and make a decision, we invite you to visit your personal dashboard.

We look forward to hearing from you,

The NeshamaTech Team

FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.subject: Update: The first party has approved the suggestion
FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.body: Hello {{matchmakerName}}, great news: {{partyName}} has approved the suggestion. The system will now forward it to the second party. To view details: {{dashboardUrl}}
FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.htmlBody:
Hello {{matchmakerName}},

Great news: {{partyName}} has approved the suggestion.

It will now be automatically sent to the second party. You can track its progress on your dashboard.

FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.subject: Update: Suggestion declined by the first party
FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.body: Hello {{matchmakerName}}, for your information, {{partyName}} has reviewed the suggestion and decided to decline. More details and the reason for declining (if provided) are available on your dashboard: {{dashboardUrl}}
FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.htmlBody:
Hello {{matchmakerName}},

For your information, {{partyName}} has reviewed the suggestion and decided it's not the right fit at this time.

More details and the reason for declining (if provided) are available on your dashboard.

PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.subject: A new suggestion for you, with high potential
PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.body: Hello {{partyName}}, {{matchmakerName}} has sent you a new suggestion, and the first party has already expressed interest. We'd love for you to take a look. For details: {{reviewUrl}}
PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.htmlBody:
Hello {{partyName}},

We have exciting news! Your matchmaker, {{matchmakerName}}, has sent you a new suggestion, and the first party has already approved it.

There seems to be high potential here, and we invite you to review the details and make a decision.

SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.subject: It's a match! Both parties have approved
SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.body: Hello {{matchmakerName}}, great news! {{partyName}} has approved the suggestion. Both parties have now approved, and you can proceed to share contact details. For more info: {{dashboardUrl}}
SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.htmlBody:
Hello {{matchmakerName}},

It's a match! ðŸŽ‰

We are happy to report that {{partyName}} has also approved the suggestion. With mutual consent from both parties, you can now proceed to share contact details.

SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.subject: Update: Suggestion declined by the second party
SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.body: Hello {{matchmakerName}}, for your information, {{partyName}} has reviewed the suggestion and decided to decline. More details are available on your dashboard: {{dashboardUrl}}
SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.htmlBody:
Hello {{matchmakerName}},

For your information, {{partyName}} has reviewed the suggestion and decided it's not the right fit at this time.

More details are available on your dashboard.

CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.subject: Best of luck! Your contact details have been exchanged
CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.body: Congratulations! You both approved the suggestion. Your full contact details have been sent to you in a separate email. We recommend making contact within the next 24-48 hours. Best of luck!
CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.htmlBody:
Time to connect!

You both approved the suggestion, which is always an exciting moment. Your full and detailed contact information has been sent to you in a separate email.

A little tip from us: Take a breath, remember the goal is simply to get acquainted, and most importantly - be yourself. We recommend making initial contact within the next 24-48 hours.

Wishing you a pleasant conversation and a wonderful meeting!
